mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO receivablesrecord (receivablesrecord_id, customername, receamount, receduedate, realamount, paybackdate, paybackstatus, customerid, transportgood_id) values
(#{item.receivablesrecord_id}, #{item.customername}, #{item.receamount}, #{item.receduedate}, #{item.realamount}, #{item.paybackdate}, #{item.paybackstatus}, #{item.customerid}, #{item.transportgood_id})
